column4: quick question is there some notification thing in gnome that causes every IM client i use to put an annoying popup in my top right on every msg??  it's bugging me to death
how can i get rid of this before i punch my screen?  it's constantly in the way when i'm reading pages and things
you can configure/disable them if you're using pidgin in Tools/Plugins/libnotify
not sure how with other clients, although I'm sure it is similiar
